explains: adj. 先发制人的；优先购买的；（桥牌）阻击性开叫的
wordGroup: preemptive right 优先购买权；股票先买权
preemptive strategy 预先占有法则；先发制人战略；抢先战略

sentences.en: They decided to launch a pre-emptive strike.
sentences.cn: 他们决定发动先发制人的攻击。

sentences.en: With interrupts enabled, the pre-emptive scheduler periodically takes control to provide multitasking.
sentences.cn: 通过启用中断，抢占式的调度器就可以周期性地接管控制权，从而提供多任务处理能力。

sentences.en: So I took pre-emptive action, composing on index cards a list of reasons why he and I should still hang out.
sentences.cn: 因此我先发制人，在索引卡片上列出了我和他仍然应该约出去的原因。
